member.name: IFileSystemBindData2.GetFileID
member.summary: Gets the unique file identifier for the current file.
member.param: When this method returns successfully, receives a pointer to the unique file identifier for the current file. pliFileID is a pointer to a value that is a concatenation of the values nFileIndexHigh and nFileIndexlow, noted in structure .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData2.GetJunctionCLSID
member.summary: Gets the class identifier (CLSID) of the object that implements for the item, if the item is a junction point.
member.param: When this method returns successfully, receives a pointer to the CLSID of the object that implements for the current item, if the item is a junction point.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData2.SetFileID
member.summary: Sets the unique file identifier for the current file.
member.param: A unique file identifier for the current file. liFileID is a value that is a concatenation of the values nFileIndexHigh and nFileIndexlow, noted in structure .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData2.SetJunctionCLSID
member.summary: Sets the class identifier (CLSID) of the object that implements , if the current item is a junction point.
member.param: The CLSID for the object that implements with a junction point as its current item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IFileSystemBindData2
member.summary: Extends , which stores file system information for optimizing calls to . This interface adds the ability set or get file ID or junction class identifier (CLSID).
